FuncDef:
The pppoe-url command sets the URL for forcibly redirecting an authenticated PPPoE user to a portal.
The undo pppoe-url command cancels the set URL.
By default, no URL is set for forcibly redirecting an authenticated PPPoE user to a portal.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the URL for forcibly redirecting an authenticated PPPoE user to a portal. The value is in the form of "http://www.huawei.com.".
The value is a string of 1 to 200 characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a PPPoE user is authenticated, the device can send a PADM packet instructing the PPPoE dialer to start the Web browsing software and access the specified URL. In this manner, the forcible portal service for the PPPoE user is implemented. The pppoe-url command sets this URL.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
